mapper.select: select blog_id as blogId, title, profile from blog where blog_id=#{id}
mapper.update: update blog set title=#{title}, profile=#{profile} where blog_id=#{blogId}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.description, a.blog_id as blogId, count(b.category_id) as count from category a left join post b on a.id = b.category_id where a.blog_id=#{id} group by a.id

select a.id, a.contents, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate, a.category_id as categoryId, a.title from post a join category b on a.category_id = b.id where b.blog_id=#{id} order by a.reg_date desc

select a.id, a.contents, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate, a.category_id as categoryId, a.title from post a join category b on a.category_id = b.id where b.blog_id=#{id} and a.category_id=#{categoryId} order by a.reg_date desc
